title: Font similar to "League Night"?
content:
Hello!!

I was wondering if anyone knew of a font that was simlar to [House’s League Night](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907204750/http:/www.houseindustries.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=7&subpage=viewfonts)?

It is quite expensive, and the client I’m working for isn’t interested in paying that much for this font, but would like something similar if it is available somewhere!

Any ideas??  
Thanks!

Reedly.

 [‹ Matching serif for FF Meta or Unit?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907204750/http:/typophile.com/node/14656 "Go to previous forum topic") [What's the best font for a novel? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907204750/http:/typophile.com/node/13627 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Reedly

comments.content:
I have heard that if you contact House directly they will sell individual fonts from a package.

Failing that, call [Wendy](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907204750/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&startrow=1&records=&currpage=1&totalrecords=3&displayfontid=LP.100007.0.0&fontRendererText=League+Night) for a bowl.

Check out Font Diner ( [http://www.fontdiner.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907204750/http:/www.fontdiner.com/ "http://www.fontdiner.com")).

Cocktail Script and Secret Recipe, part of the County Fair Picnic set, might be reasonable substitutes.

Stephen listed some other options in this thread :)

[http://www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/51651.html?1098307500](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907204750/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/51651.html?1098307500 "http://www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/51651.html?1098307500")
stewf, it seems that all fontshop links are only taking me to the portal page (choose your country) as of late. wassup with that?

We’re testing software that sends people to their local FontShop so most folks don’t need to see the country page. If the software isn’t sure where you reside it will take you to the country page to confirm.

It shouldn’t need to do that more than once tho. Your country selection should be baked into your cookie. Hmm, I’ll look into it.
